Text: RE Welcome BackNonPrivilegedpst Jeff I am glad to see that you are finally working on getting educated I am also trying to finish my last three units I started in long story Hope all is well with you Lee PS I recently moved to AZ Original Message From owner aasBerkeleyEDU mailtoowner aasBerkeleyEDUOn Behalf Of Dasovich Jeff Sent Thursday August AM To Teresa Janus Subject RE Welcome Back Greetings Thanks for the welcome back Couple things how many units do I need to graduate where can I go other than scrounge up the pieces of paper I receive in the mail at the end of every semester to find out how many units Ive thus far accumulated Finally I notice that you mentioned that Shelanskys class is full up even the waiting the list Would I be ejected from the program if I nonetheless tried to get in Look forward to seeing you soon Best Jeff Original Message From Teresa Janus mailto aasBerkeleyEDU Sent Wednesday August PM To Subject Welcome Back Hi Evening MBA Students Welcome back to school Here are a few updates regarding the Fall semester Continuing Students Classes begin the week of Monday August Confirmed Class Schedule Please come by the Evening MBA office on the first night of classes to review your confirmed class schedule Wed also like you to fill out an Address Update Form with current information on employer and other contact information Whether you have updates or not please come by the office and sign the form so we will be able to include your information in the Fall student address directory Waitlists If you are on a waitlist for any course Ill update the waitlist status each Friday afternoon Ill let you know by email as soon as you are officially enrolled and will let you know when to pick up the textbooksreaders AddDrops If you plan to add or drop any courses please come into the office and fill out an adddrop form when classes begin If you are dropping a course and you received books andor readers for the course please return them with the form This is required Well order books for you when you add a class Please note that we are unable to return reading packets for credit so if you drop a course we will try to find another student who wants to add the course and needs the reader However if no other student is adding the course you will be responsible for reimbursing us for the cost of the reader Day Classes If you are interested in taking day classes a list of Fall day electives will be available in the Evening MBA office when classes begin Please let me know the course number and title by email Course descriptions for day classes can be found at Coursescourseshtml If space is available in a day class the fulltime MBA Program staff will add you manually to the course Please dont add through Telebears During the first three weeks of classes Ill confirm the availability of seats by email on Fridays Please note that BA units cannot be used toward your MBA degree requirements Textbooks and Readers You may pick up textbooks and readingcase packets by coming to the Evening MBA Program office We are open MondayThursday am pm and Friday am pm Textbooks and readers will also be available to you the first week of classes MondayThursday pm and during your break in room F Health Insurance Waivers The deadline to submit your waiver was July and a credit will show up on your next statement if you submitted a form on time Please call University Health Services at if you have any questions or to see if it is possible to submit a late form Shuttle Buses The shuttle pickup times will remain the same as last semester pm The South Bay Shuttle pickup location remains the same at Our Ladys Way not S Inc parking lot Parking To obtain your parking permits and passes we ask that you come by the office to pick up your permit and passes or drive to the Kleeberger Field Lot where one of the student workers will have your permit and passes ready for you to pick up from pm during the first week of classes Before and after the first week you may pick up your passes from the office Writing Requirement The last day for Fall students to submit writing samples for the Writing Requirement is Monday September Students who have not fulfilled their writing requirements will not be able to preroll in Spring courses Course Updates E High Tech Marketing first class meets Saturday August am noon at Intel directions emailed to registered students E Taxes Firm Strategy Suneel Udpa has been cancelled New Class E Technology Sector Literacy Sarah Tasker units Tuesdays pm pm ABSTRACT This course is a beta test of a new course under development The new course will be aimed exclusively at students with zero technical background and will provide an overview of the technologies and companies that comprise the IT information technology industry Enrollment in Fall is by permission of the instructor only Interested students should contact Sarah Tasker at and cc See Coursescourseshtml Current Evening MBA Students Website Please check out our website at EvMBA where youll find information on courses financial aid the Back to School Packet Health Insurance Waivers Majordomo the Student Directory Bear Facts and TeleBEARS We look forward to seeing you TJ This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
